title: "Your accounts does not yet have access to the alpha test"
body: I received an email yesterday from Riot stating that I got accepted into the alpha client test. After downloading and installing the client, I went to log in only to get this message, which confused me. Can someone explain why I am getting this message? {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: We finished sending out all the invites today. If you are still not able to login and you signed up for the alpha, please submit a support ticket.
I got exactly the same thing happen to me but I'm on the EUW servers
